attributes.action: For safety, review case of man who hit his wife with bat & made her drink bleach
attributes.background: A man in England will not face time in jail after he hit his wife with a cricket bat and poured bleach down her throat reports the Independent. Judge Richard Mansell QC ruled that Mustafa Bashir would not serve time in jail despite Bashir admitting to assault resulting in actual bodily harm.

rejection.details: After a review of this case, Mustafa Bashir has been sentenced to 18 months in prison.
